content.text:
# The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl (book)

The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl is a 2015 memoir written by Issa Rae. In the book, Rae chronicles her life through a series of humorous autobiographical essays and stories. The book's title is taken from Rae's popular web series of the same name, often simply referred to as Awkward Black Girl (2013â€“2015). Upon release, the book became a New York Times best-seller.
